overview: Forty years after the release of Rosa von Praunheim's film, NICHT DER HOMOSEXUELLE IST PERVERS, SONDERN DIE SITUATION IN DER ER LEBT, a group of men assemble to review, rewrite and restage its legendary final scene. THE ROSA SONG combines dialogue from the original film with challenging new ideas about gay male life in Germany and internationally, concluding with a rousing musical manifesto that breathes new life into this 1970s classic.
title: The Rosa Song
